This is MBA TECH, where we merge the worlds of technology, engineering, computer science, and human sciences to create a one-of-a-kind business education. TECH program is designed for business professionals who want to enhance their skills and knowledge in the tech industry.

Our curriculum focuses on real-world applications and combines technical expertise with the business acumen needed to succeed in today's fast-paced, technology-driven world. We place a strong emphasis on communication and HR, recognizing that strong leadership and interpersonal skills are essential for success in the technology industry.

Throughout the program, you will have the opportunity to work on projects with real-world applications, collaborate with industry experts, and network with fellow professionals. By the end of the program, you will be well-equipped to take on leadership roles in the tech industry and make a meaningful impact in your career.

Innovative curriculum that blends technology with business

Collaborative projects with industry experts and networking opportunities

Emphasis on real-world applications and hands-on experience

Tailored program for working professionals

Who are we looking for?

At MBA TECH, we're looking for ambitious and driven individuals who are passionate about technology and business. We're seeking professionals who have a strong desire to learn, grow, and challenge themselves. Also willing to put in the hard work and dedication required to succeed in the program.

Core Courses

Our core courses are carefully selected to provide you with a comprehensive understanding of the key concepts and skills you'll need to succeed in the tech industry.

First Semester

Global Economy and Economics of Innovation

Finance and Financial Accounting

International Marketing

Psychology of Management

Data, Models, and Decisions

Second Semester

Operational Management

Human Resource Management

Strategic Leadership

Optimizing Business Decision

Sustainable Business Models and Corporate Governance

Specialization

We recognize that each professional's career path is unique, which is why we offer a diverse range of specializations that will allow you to tailor your MBA TECH experience to your specific needs and career aspirations.

Third Semester

MBA in Automatics and Computer Science

MBA in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence

MBA in Engineering Management

MBA in Modern Technology Management

MBA in Data Science Management

MBA in Energy Transition

MBA in Future of Mining and Space Technology

MBA in Petroleum GeoScience and Energy

MBA in Virtual Reality and Augmented Reality Technology

Collaborations

At MBA TECH, we understand the importance of practical, industry-relevant education. That's why we've partnered with the biggest and most innovative companies in the tech industry to provide our participants with a world-class educational experience.

Teaching Team Members

It's not just about what you will learn – it's about who you will meet. You will be working on projects with real-world applications, collaborating with industry experts, and networking with fellow professionals.

Read more about Teaching Team Members

Requirements for Applications

Bachelor's or Master's degree from an accredited university.

Minimum 2 years of managerial experience in the related field.

Resume: A detailed resume highlighting the candidate's work experience, education, and professional achievements.

Fluent English language capability.

Personal Statements: The candidate's insights into their motivation for pursuing an Executive MBA, professional goals, and fit with the program through personal statements.

Looking to shake things up in the tech industry?
Look no further than MBA TECH – the program that's merging the worlds of technology and business to create the leaders of tomorrow.
